name.baseName: Municipal sludge treatment and disposal;wet sludge moisture content 65%;mixed with straw to generate electricity
市政污泥处理与处置;湿污泥 含水率65%;与稻秸混燃发电

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The sludge and bituminous coal co-combustion power generation process and the sludge and rice straw co-combustion power generation process are the actual operation cases of a sludge co-combustion co-combustion power generation company in Kunshan, which uses the plant's 45 t/h circulating fluidized bed boiler and is equipped with a 6 MW back-pressure generator set.
污泥与烟煤混燃发电工艺、污泥与稻 秸混燃发电工艺均为昆山某污泥混燃协同发电公司 实际运行案例，采用该厂 45 t /h 循环流化床锅炉， 配套 6 MW 背压式发电机组。

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: 1 t wet sludge with a moisture content of 65% was used as the functional unit.

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: A sludge co-combustion co-power generation company in Kunshan
昆山某污泥混燃协同发电公司

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: The process uses a low-temperature dehumidification and drying process to dry it to a moisture content of about 40%, which is mixed with rice straw.
该工艺采用低温除湿干化工艺将其干化至含水率 40%左右与稻秸混燃。
technology.technologicalApplicability: The industrial process described involves the utilization of municipal sludge with a moisture content of 65% mixed with straw as a fuel source for co-combustion in a power generation facility. The material is intended for use in energy recovery processes in Kunshan co-combustion cogeneration power plants. It primarily serves in the conversion of wet municipal sludge into electricity, contributing to waste management and energy production.
所述工业过程涉及使用含水率65%的市政污泥与稻秸混合作为共燃料，在发电设施中用于共燃发电。该材料主要用于昆山共燃联合发电厂的能源回收过程中。它主要用于将湿式市政污泥转化为电能，同时促进废物管理和能源生产。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 周钢,宋涛,马士伟等.不同污泥混燃发电工艺生命周期评价[J].洁净煤技术,2022,28(11):19-29.DOI:10.13226/j.issn.1006-6772.RE22042401.
周钢,宋涛,马士伟等.不同污泥混燃发电工艺生命周期评价[J].洁净煤技术,2022,28(11):19-29.DOI:10.13226/j.issn.1006-6772.RE22042401.

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this dataset for Life Cycle Assessment (LCA), users should consider the specific moisture content specified, as this affects the energy content and combustion efficiency. The defined functional unit is 1 tonne of wet sludge with a 65% moisture content; any variations in the sludge characteristics or moisture content will require adjustments in the assessment. Additionally, it is essential to account for the origin of the straw used for co-combustion and any additional environmental load associated with its production and transportation. Users should ensure that system boundaries are consistently applied when considering the inclusion of upstream and downstream processes.
在使用该数据集进行生命周期评估（LCA）时，用户应考虑所指定的具体含水量，因为这会影响能源含量和燃烧效率。定义的功能单位是含水率为65%的湿污泥1吨；污泥特性或含水量的任何变化都将需要在评估中进行调整。此外，用户必须考虑共燃用稻秸的来源、以及与其生产和运输相关的任何额外环境负荷。使用者应确保在考虑包括上游和下游过程时，系统边界得到一致的应用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: The upstream production process includes sludge transportation and drying, rice planting, rice straw pretreatment and rice straw transportation.The downstream production mainly involves solid waste that can be used after incineration.
该工艺生产上游包括污泥运输及干化、水稻种植、稻秸预处理以及稻秸运输过程。生产下游主要涉及焚烧后可利用固体废弃物。

The environmental impact of the production process mainly considers the direct or indirect emissions of gas pollutants, water pollutants and solid waste.
生产过程环境影响主要考虑气体污染物、水体污染物以及固体废弃物的直接或间接排放。
